sn33.1:1: At Sāvatthī. Then the wanderer Vacchagotta approached the Blessed One and exchanged greetings with him.[n.294] Vacchagotta appears as the inquirer in three suttas in MN, Nos.7,72, and73. In the third he becomes a monk and attains arahantship. In SN he reappears in44:7–, again with questions about the undeclared points.When they had concluded their greetings and cordial talk, he sat down to one side and said to him:sn.iii.258
